headline: Garmin Expands Aviation Footprint With Mesa Facility And Data Partnership
summary: Garmin (NYSE:GRMN) acquired a new hangar and office complex at Mesa Gateway Airport in Arizona to expand its aviation operations. The Mesa facility is intended to support aircraft certification and flight testing for Garmin’s aviation products. Garmin also entered a collaboration with Brazos Safety Systems to integrate advanced flight data monitoring and safety analytics into its FlyGarmin platform. Garmin’s aviation segment sits alongside its consumer wearables, marine, automotive and...
